quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.text: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.text: Enjoy the little things, for one day you may look back and realize they were the big things.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.text: Wear gratitude like a cloak and it will feed every corner of your life.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.text: The roots of all goodness lie in the soil of appreciation for goodness.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.text: Joy does not simply happen to us. We have to choose joy and keep choosing it every day.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen
quotes.source: The Return of the Prodigal Son

quotes.text: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.text: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.text: The struggle ends when gratitude begins.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.text: Acknowledging the good that you already have in your life is the foundation for all abundance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: The thankful receiver bears a plentiful harvest.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.text: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Melody Beattie

quotes.text: In ordinary life, we hardly realize that we receive a great deal more than we give.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.text: Silent gratitude isn't very much to anyone.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.text: The best way to pay for a lovely moment is to enjoy it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.text: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward
